# hw_brownie (Resource)

A rich, fudgy dessert resource that demonstrates the sweeter side of Terraform. Learn resource management while satisfying your chocolate cravings.

*Dense and chocolatey,*
*Fudgy squares of pure bliss,*
*Dessert perfection.*



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `kind` (String) The kind of brownie (e.g., fudge, walnut, blondie, double chocolate)

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the brownie resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Brownie identifier
- `price` (Number) The price of the brownie in dollars (hardcoded to $2.00)
